title: Bug 49536: No webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: The user has reported a bug where, if no webapps are deployed, accessing a URL returns a HTTP code 200 OK response with no content instead of an expected HTTP error 404.
OB: When a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed is accessed via a URL, it returns a HTTP code 200 OK response with no content.
EB: When a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed is accessed via a URL, it should return a HTTP error 404 response indicating that the requested resource is not found.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Download and install Tomcat 7.
2. Do not deploy any webapps on the Tomcat instance.
3. Access a URL on the Tomcat instance.
4. Observe that the response is a HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of a HTTP error 404.
